resources.string: Error occurred while parsing vcard file
Error occurred while parsing contact details
Please grant read call logs permission to this application
Finished exporting contacts to internal/external storage\'s root directory

Brings privacy to your contacts information


1.) No other app would be able to access contacts as it saves contacts in its own database seperate from default contacts.

2.) Can be used in place of your default phone(dialer) app.

3.) You can export / import contacts from Android contacts app into this app.

4.) Maintains call log as well coz Android call log app would not be able to show name of contact.

5.) Also shows the person name upon receiving call.

6.) Caller id would show upon call and you can drag to position it.

Filled star before a number signifies that it would be primary number for that contact and would be used to call/sms when clicked from contacts list.\n\nBy default first number in list would be primary
Tap to learn more about the star.

To import contacts into this app, goto default contacts app, export contacts. Try opening a file explorer and tap on exported file. In the list of open with apps, tap on open contacts, Open contacts would import all the contacts

Tap on search icon in the menu. T9 Keyboard would pop out with only numbers but small letters three on each would be present and covers all the alphabets. Use the numeric keys to input name.
Example: To search for contact 'john', type 5646 because letter j is present on number 5, o is on 6 and so on. It might look a bit new but would be better than normal full keyboard search.
You could also search for phone number by entering the required number with the help of same keyboard.
In case you want to go back to traditional search, you can do so by going into menu and selecting Toggle T9 search
On the main screen, click the top right menu and then select export. It would export all the contacts to file and will tell the location of export

Caller id refers to showing the name of contact during an incoming call.

Caller id comes up and by default it sits almost at middle of the screen. But you can very well drag it to any place on screen you want and that position will be saved automatically.


So, after installing the app, try to get a call from any number and drag caller id to place it somewhere you like. But keep in my mind that caller id is draggable only when call comes when screen in unlocked. Android has this issue of not able to take input events on screens created while phone is locked. Hence make sure you unlock your screen before asking someone to call.
Example: +91 for India. Do not forget to input + in front
Can not process this import without storage permission, please retry
Grant storage phone permission to be able to export and import contacts
This will allow app to show the calling person\'s name on screen during call
Grant manage phone permission to be able to read call log

Whatsapp requires mobile number including country code having \'+\' in it. In case your whatsapp number is 9876543210, you need to add your country code before it so that whatsapp can recognize it while trying to open conversation from OpenContacts. In case your country code is +91, then the complete number should look like +919876543210.\n\nIn menu of OpenContacts, there is a new entry to enter default whatsapp country code. While entering country code, do not forget to enter + in it. In case any of numbers present in OpenContacts is not having country code, this country code would be appended by default. In case of international whatsapp contacts, you would need to manually edit that number to include the correct country code
Please export contacts, then delete all contacts using menu and then import again to complete app upgrade. Else app will crash with issues
Base address of card dav server
You can enable this only after installing whatsapp
Invalid username or password or url
No app found that could open this

Favorite contacts would be placed on top of contacts list so that you can find them easily. You can add or remove favorites in two ways.

1. From contact details page, in the menu you would find a heart symbol clicking on it would toggle the favorite status.
2. In contacts list, long clicking a contact would lead to menu toggling the favorite status.

One of your favorite app faced an issue. Sharing the below log would help fix it sooner. To share it, you can either use

1. Share button in the top right menu and then email the log to developer or

2. Copy the log using copy to clipboard button and share it on github issue.
